topic.title: http://zero.btnova.org/0cnguide.bitzero.btnova.org is blocked?
topic.body: This zeronet proxy address "http://zero.btnova.org/0cnguide.bit" can't be accessed in mainland China. Any similar sites for substitution? I love this proxy, there are lots of Chinese Sites providing much good resource, but it's down now. So sad about it.

1_1QAzuG33PZZEBPHjrumzCfXqfgxeo5ifsa.body: Are these movies downloading fast? or can these movie be streaming online for watching?

1_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY.body: Who can supply a download address other than the offical site. because I can't download from the RetroShare Offical Site form China, the link of amazon AWS is blocked by GOV.

> [1491301186](#comment_9_1AZG3avnpwcn37q9eeCEjXKFBye81eAxg5): If you are able to use the Tor browser from China I can give you an OnionShare link to the Retroshare software. Just let me know what operating system you are using.

Thanks so much for reply. I have solve the problem by using a tor browser after a long waiting to startup. Whatever, the RetroShare it works on my PC now, even though I have no friend to add. ;)
I have added your Certificate with my retroshare client.
where can I find and add more people around the world? Or is it just a app for communication, file sharing, etc between friends not strangers?

> [thegillies](#comment_12_1NTgaYjK2bh1axvruth8HqtGt6Pw5ab13x): 

I have addied you as my friends.
